title: Age of Mythology Extended Edition (Direct)
description:
----------------------------------------------
 Age.of.Mythology.Extended.Edition in English
----------------------------------------------
Installation
_________________

1.) Download the torrent.
2.) Create a folder on your desktop and name it anything - e.g. Age of Mythology.
3.) Open the RAR file named "AoM" that you have just downloaded.
4.) Extract all the contents of the RAR file into the folder now named "Age of Mythology" 
5.) (OPTIONAL BUT RECOMMENDED) Download visual c++ redistributable or if on mac skip this step.
5.) Open the folder "Age of Mythology"
6.) Find "aomx" in the folder and right click then pressed "Create shortcut" .
7.) Now take the new shortcut of "aomx" and drag to the desktop.
8.) Right click the "aomx" on desktop and press rename - Now rename it to whatever you would like e.g. Age of Mythology Extended Edition.
9.) Now double click the game and PLAY!
10.) Have Fun (This is not optional.


FULL AUDIO  
FULL GAME
MULTIPLAYER SUPPORTED (WITH HAMACHI)  
WINDOWS AND MAC SUPPORTED
